description: Creates a web login token for the Airflow Web UI. To learn more, see Creating an Apache Airflow web login token.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the Amazon MWAA environment. For example, MyMWAAEnvironment.

nested_items.name: WebToken
nested_items.description: An Airflow web server login token.

nested_items.name: WebServerHostname
nested_items.description: The Airflow web server hostname for the environment.

nested_items.name: IamIdentity
nested_items.description: The name of the IAM identity creating the web login token. This might be an IAM user, or an assumed or federated identity. For example, assumed-role/Admin/your-name.

nested_items.name: AirflowIdentity
nested_items.description: The user name of the Apache Airflow identity creating the web login token.
